subject: Gambling
Officiating (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. commissioner has concluded that the league’s rules on gambling were unrealistic, and has decided to stop punishing referees for minor violations of league rules.
snippet: The N.B.A. commissioner has concluded that the league’s rules on gambling were unrealistic, and has decided to stop punishing referees for minor violations of league rules.
